response: Yes, but you have to change or delete a certain file in the game data. It sounds difficult but really isn't. Look up 'bastion Windows 8 troubleshooting' or something similar on Google. Also, I highly recommend an Xbox 360 wired controller. It makes the game so much more playable on pc.

context: I have a feeling its a really dumb question to ask, but does it come in the original box of the headset or another box? Im just kinda curious
response: Yes, it does come in an "original" Turtle Beach box, but one that is labeled "re-certified". It also comes with an original instruction book.  My son has had no problem with it.  It works just fine.

context: Does this come with a xbox live 1 month code and a standard xbox 360 headset?
response: this item includes 120 gb HD, power brick, one black wireless controller and will include one game only. No box , no headset,

context: can you program the buttons to be used as any key? or just numbers?
response: Bryce, you can program the keys to carry out any action on your PC. MMO games especially. Not just numbers.

context: Does the keyboard light turn off when the computer goes to sleep?
response: It does if you put it into manual sleep mode (when you click sleep), but not when the screen times out.

context: Is the Micro USB charging port the same as the DS3?
response: PS3/DS3 used a mini USB, PS4/DS4 uses micro USB.  Image for clarity: http://blog.premiumusb.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/mini_vs_micro.jpg

context: If I buy the physical copy of the game will that redeem on steam?
response: Hey Tim,The physical version does NOT use Steam. However, if you buy the digital download version from Amazon it does use STEAM.

context: Can you jump in this game?
response: Nope. All you can do is climb or vault over objects witching a certain range.

context: How would this work for Smash?
response: It's supposed to be awesome for Smash. That is the reason my son asked for this controller. 1st Item I purchase did not keep a charge. So I had to send it back. I reordered a new one.

context: Does this have a twist access or not? On CH website, it says it has a three way axis, which makes me think it does, but some reviews say it doesn't.
response: You have the X, Y and Z.  X being left to right stick, Y  being  fore and aft stick, and z being a wheel on the left of the stick.  There is no twist.

context: can I play this on windows 8
response: Yes you can play this game on win 8.  I have reinstalled this game on a new computer and it worked not only great but with zero extra steps

response: It is appropriate for all ages! I am 63 and love it!
